title: Track Care Gap Closure
description: A population health manager wants to see if their outreach campaign for diabetic eye exams has been effective.

tasks.description: Run a report on the 'Diabetic Eye Exam' quality measure for the current year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager generates the performance report for the measure.

tasks.description: Compare the current performance rate to the rate from the previous quarter, before the outreach campaign began.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager compares the two data points.

tasks.description: Note that the performance rate has increased by 10%, indicating the campaign was successful.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is able to measure the impact of their population health intervention.
